name: ISO (itch) (StarArts)
description:
Iso is a puzzle platformer where you change your size to complete puzzles. Get smaller to fit through tight spaces and larger to push heavy objects. How will you solve these puzzles? Find out by downloading the game!

(Any and all feedback is appreciated)

You can find more from the creators here:

Etho (Game Design and Programming): https://stararts.itch.io/

Chip (Sprites and Animation): https://kitifulninesgames.itch.io/

Josh (Audio Design and Music): https://twitter.com/joshyeemus

This game is a submission to Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022
